name: Acid Split
description:
Bullet Hell Top-Down Shooter Entry for the GMTK 2021

48 Hours - 2 Man Team - Unity3D

A straight-up Bullet-Hell madness with a little twist to the formula. You control a Character stringed by a very thin and fragile link, the secondary character moves with the force of the main one and is the one that shoots the bullets.

DON't GET TO FAR OR IT WILL BREAK! IF EITHER ONE DIES ITS GAME OVER!

Give a try and show yourself what you're made of, it's no walk in the park

Post your scores in the comments!
